headline.main: Pence Jokes With 'Enemy of the People' at Gridiron Dinner
headline.print_headline: Pence Jokes With 'Enemy of the People' at Gridiron Dinner

lead_paragraph: President Donald Trump has declared that the media are the "enemy of the people," but his administration is willing to joke around with reporters — and poke fun at itself — in a venerable Washington tradition.
snippet: President Donald Trump has declared that the media are the "enemy of the people," but his administration is willing to joke around with reporters — and poke fun at itself — in a venerable Washington tradition....
